units.title: Cell dissociation with Accutase
units.text: with 0.5 mM Accutase (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #A1110501) to yield a single cell
units.rationale: Specifies the enzyme and concentration used to obtain single cells.

units.title: Plating for differentiation initiation
units.text: Differentiation was initiated by plating 2500 single cells in each well of (Miltenyi, #130-103-456), 400 ng/ml SHH-C24II (Miltenyi, #130-095-727), and a 96-well U-bottom plate (Corning, #CLS7007) in iPS Brew with 10 µM Y-27632 1.5 μM CHIR99021 (Miltenyi, #130-106-539), and in the presence of 200 mM dihydrochloride (Miltenyi, #130-106-538), as previously described27.
units.rationale: Describes the exact seeding density, plate type, and supplements for starting differentiation.

units.title: Transfer of embryoid bodies to differentiation medium
units.text: embryoid bodies were transferred to differentiation medium streptomycin (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #15140122).
units.rationale: Indicates the step where early aggregates are moved to a defined medium.

units.title: Transfer to 24-well plate on day 11
units.text: On day 11, developing VM organoids were transferred to a 24-well plate containing 1:50 Neurobasal medium, B27 supplement without vita-
units.rationale: Specifies the timing and new culture vessel for further maturation.

units.title: Addition of BDNF and Ascorbic acid on day 14
units.text: On day 14, 20 ng/mL BDNF (Miltenyi, #130-096-286) and 200 µM L-Ascorbic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, #A4403-100MG) were added.
units.rationale: Lists growth factors added at a specific developmental stage.

units.title: Addition of db-cAMP and DAPT from day 16
units.text: From day 16 onward, 0.5 mM db-cAMP (Sigma-Aldrich, #D0627-1G) and 1 μM DAPT (R&D Systems, #2634) were added to the culture.
units.rationale: Provides the compounds and concentrations used for later maturation.

units.title: Matrigel embedding of organoids
units.text: organoids were embedded in 30 µL droplets of Matrigel (BD Biosciences)

units.title: Standard normoxic culture conditions
units.text: Both conventional and silk-VM organoids were cultured at 37 °C in 21% O2 and 5% CO2 in normoxia conditions.
units.rationale: Defines the baseline atmospheric conditions for culture.

units.title: Hypoxia treatment protocol
units.text: For hypoxia analysis, organoids were transferred to the hypoxia chamber (Binder CB160), which was filled with 1% O2 and 5% CO2 and mixed with N2, and collected after 4, 8, and 16 h.
units.rationale: Details the hypoxic exposure setup and time points.

units.title: Cell viability assay
units.text: Cell viability was measured using the colorimetric CyQuant cell proliferation assay (Invitrogen), following the manufacturer’s instructions.
units.rationale: Specifies the assay used to assess cell health.
